```{.r .cell-code}
library(mistlecode)

options(scipen = 999)
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dt <-
  readLines("input2.txt") |>
  str_match("(Sensor at x=)(-?\\d+)(, y=)(-?\\d+)(: closest beacon is at x=)(-?\\d+)(, y=)(-?\\d+)") |>
  `colnames<-`(c("input", "burn", "xS", "burn", "yS", "burn", "xB", "burn", "yB")) |>
  data.frame() |>
  select(xS, yS, xB, yB) |>
  lapply(as.integer) |>
  data.frame() |>
  as.matrix()
```
:::
